name: Margo: The Bean Adventure
description:
Will You Rescue Margo's nation or Not ?

Margo is a bean that was living in peace with his family, but peace could not last so long !
An evil sun attacked Margo nation and turned them into black rocks.
Now Margo will ride this adventure to rescue his nation by defeating the sun.
But through his adventure, he will go through a lot of different puzzles, fight monsters and bosses.

Features:
1. 43 levels included.
2. 8 bosses fights with different stages.
4. Bosses can be skipped after 280 seconds.
5. Supports English and Arabic languages.
6. Stunning music and SFX.
7. Suitable for casual players

The game is an adventure game where the player goes through set of puzzles, fight mini monsters and fight bosses with different stages.
The puzzles are :
- Find hidden numbers
- Use the keyboard to spawn objects
- Grab objects and place them to climb on them
- And more
